name: Tribal Totem
Start point: Kangai Mau in the Shrimp and Parrot pub in Brimhaven.
Description: Lord Handelmort of Ardougne is a collector of exotic artifacts. A recent addition to his private collection is a strange looking totem from Karamja. The Rantuki tribe are not happy about the recent disappearance of their totem, and Kangai Mau wants your help retrieving it.
Recommended: Coins for travel (Ship from Ardougne to Brimhaven, potentially teleports)
Draynor Village teleport or Amulet of glory for faster travel to Wizards' Tower

substeps: Travel to Brimhaven on Karamja.
Speak to Kangai Mau in the Shrimp and Parrot pub (north-east Brimhaven).
Travel to East Ardougne.
Go to Lord Handelmort's mansion, west of the marketplace (look for the house with guard dogs in a fenced garden).
Speak to Horacio the Gardener outside the mansion.
Attempt to open the front door (it will be locked).
Go to Wizard Cromperty's house (blue building with a telescope on top) in north-east Ardougne.
Speak to Wizard Cromperty and ask him to teleport you.
You will arrive in the RPDT Depot.
Search the south-eastern crate to obtain a Shipping label.
Use the Shipping label on the crate next to it (the one destined for the Wizards' Tower).
Speak to the RPDT employee and ask them to ship the crate.
Travel to the Wizards' Tower (south of Draynor Village).
Go down the ladder to the basement.
Search the crate you sent earlier to find a Guide Book.
Read the Guide Book. Note the names mentioned (especially KURT and BRAD).
Return to Wizard Cromperty in Ardougne.
Speak to him and ask to be teleported again.
You will arrive inside Lord Handelmort's mansion.
Attempt to pick the lock on the wooden door.
Enter the code `K U R T` when prompted.
Search the stairs to disable the trap.
Go upstairs.
Open the chest and search it to obtain the Totem pole.
Travel back to Brimhaven.
Speak to Kangai Mau in the Shrimp and Parrot pub.
Give him the Totem pole to complete the quest.
